events.title: Wootz Quest
events.description: An exciting team-based event that challenges participants' metallurgical knowledge, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills through three unique rounds.

rounds.name: Material Match
rounds.description: In this round, teams of two work collaboratively to match material properties with their correct applications. Each team member receives a different set of questions—one listing material properties and the other listing applications. Initially, they must eliminate the two least likely options on their paper within 10 minutes. Then, they exchange papers, and the second member selects the correct answer from the remaining choices. Accuracy and speed determine the winners, but communication is strictly prohibited during the round.

rounds.name: Pictionary
rounds.description: One team member draws clues representing a metallurgical term while the other guesses within two minutes.

rounds.name: Metallurgy Detective
rounds.description: Participants solve real-life material failure case studies using logical reasoning and metallurgical expertise.

venue.location: Survey Lab and N Block ground

events.title: MINDSPARK ARENA
events.description: A competitive knowledge-based event designed to test decision-making, analytical thinking, and engineering expertise.

rounds.name: Beat the Question Challenge
rounds.description: Teams strategically answer questions, doubling their points for correct answers or losing them for wrong ones.

rounds.name: Myth Busters
rounds.description: Participants analyze engineering-related statements and justify whether they are true or myths.

rounds.name: Casting
rounds.description: Participants create molds using plaster of Paris to learn practical material processing techniques.

venue.location: Survey Lab and N Block ground

events.title: WOOTZ MAESTRO
events.description: A Metallurgical quiz competition consisting of two rounds.

rounds.name: Preliminary Quiz
rounds.description: A common quiz round for all participants.

rounds.name: Final Quiz
rounds.description: Top 5 teams compete in a quiz master format to determine the winner.

venue.location: Survey Lab and N Block ground

events.title: PAPER PRESENTATION
events.description: Students present their research on metallurgy, materials science, and related topics.
topics: AI & ML in material science and manufacturing process
Extractive metallurgy – Ferrous and Non-Ferrous metals
Materials for Defence, Nuclear and Aerospace
Simulation in manufacturing and material science
Smart materials, Bio-materials and functional materials

venue.location: Survey Lab and N Block ground
